Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: Hexo
Post._content:
##  Hexo 

###  Hexo/butterfly 

- butterfly
  - layout
    - includes
      - head (<head> CSS/JS )
      - header ()
      - mixins
        - article-sort.pug ()
        - indexPost.pug ( Home )
      - page
        - 404.pug
        - categories.pug ()
        - default-page.pug ()
        - tags.pug ()
      - layout.pug ()
    - archive.pug ( includes : layout.pug)
    - category.pug
    - index.pug ( Home )
    - page.pug ( archivetags)
    - post.pug ()
    - tag.pug
  - scripts
  - source

`layout.pug` Pug  `block`  `block content`

`index.pug`, `post.pug`, `page.pug` `extends`  `layout.pug` `block` `post.pug` 

`archive.pug``category.pug`  `tag.pug`  `layout.pug`

`includes/head.pug`  `includes/header.pug``head.pug` `header.pug`  is_home()  is_post()

`includes/mixins/`  **Pug** (Mixin)`indexPostUI.pug` `article-sort.pug` 

`includes/page/`  `page.pug`type type "tags" `tags.pug` 

### hexo  debug 

PugHexo

```js
mixin diaryPostUI()
  //- 
  - console.log('===  ===')
  - console.log(':', site.posts.length)
  - const diaryPosts = site.posts.filter(post => post.diary).sort('-date')
  - console.log(':', diaryPosts.length)
  - console.log(':', diaryPosts.map(post => post.title))
  - console.log('diary:', site.posts.map(post => { return { title: post.title, diary: post.diary } }))
  //- 
  
  //- ...  ...
```



```bash
hexo cl
hexo g --debug
```

`--debug`Hexo`console.log`

Post.title: Hexo deploy  Github Actions
Post._content:
`hexo``hexo d` Github `username.github.io` Github  Github `deploy g``public` html  Github `source/_post` Github **Github Actions****Github Actions** Action nice 

 AI **Github Actions** 

## Hexo 

### Hexo 
 `hexo` 

```bash
hexo clean
hexo cl   // 
```

 html 

```bash
hexo generate
hexo g          // 
hexo g --debug  // debug 
```



```bash
hexo server
```

 Github 

```bash
hexo deploy
hexo d   // 
```

`hexo d`

### `hexo d` 

 `hexo deploy`  `hexo d` Hexo 

```
# 
hexo d   _config.yml     
```

 `_config.yml` 

```
# _config.yml
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: https://github.com/your-username/your-username.github.io.git
  branch: main
  message: "Site updated: {{ now('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') }}"
```



1. Hexo  `_config.yml`  `deploy` 

2.  `type: git`  `hexo-deployer-git` 

3. 

   -  `public`  `hexo g` 
   -  Git 

4.  Git 

   ```
   # 
   cd public
   git init
   git add .
   git commit -m "Site updated: 2024-01-01 12:00:00"
   git push -f https://github.com/your-username/your-username.github.io.git main
   ```

5.  Git 

6. Github  `Settings`  `Pages`  **Deploy from a branch**  branch 

### 

- `hexo d`  `public` HTMLCSSJS
-  `git push -f` 
- 

###  `hexo d` 

1. 

   ```
   # hexo-deployer-git 
   #  public/  Git 
   # 
   ```

2. Git 

   ```
   # hexo-deployer-git 
   # 1.  public/  Git 
   # 2. 
   
   # 
   # 1.  Git 
   # 2. 
   # 3. 
   ```



##  GitHub Actions 

GitHub Actions Workflow Hexo ** Markdown  `main`  `gh-pages`Actions  GitHub Pages**



-  `source/_posts`  `_config.yml` GitHub  `git clone` 
-  Node.js  Hexo  GitHub 
-  Markdown  GitHub



##  GitHub Actions 

### 

1.  GitHub  `my-hexo-blog` Hexo ****( `hexo d` )

2.  Hexo  Git 

```
cd your-hexo-blog
git init
git remote add origin https://github.com/your-username/your-username.github.io
git add .
git commit -m "Hexo"
git push -u origin my-hexo-blog  #  my-hexo-blog
```

> **** `.gitignore`  `public/`  `node_modules/` `hexo d`  `.deploy_git` GitHub  butterfly  `.git`  Github Actions  `.deploy_git`  `.gitignore`  `.git`  `.gitmodular`


###  GitHub Pages 

1.  **GitHub Pages ** `username.github.io` 

2.  "Settings" -> "Pages"

3.  "Source" ** "GitHub Actions"**  ( **Deploy from a branch** `hexo d`)


###  GitHub Actions 

****`my-hexo-blog` `Add file` `.github/workflows/pages.yml`

 YAML  `pages.yml` 

```
name: Pages # 

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - my-hexo-blog  #  'main' 

jobs:
  build: #  build 
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest #  Ubuntu 
    steps:
      - name: Checkout # 1
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          submodules: recursive  # 

      - name: Setup Node.js # 2 Node.js 
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: "20" #  Node.js 

      - name: Setup npm cache # 3 npm 
        uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: node_modules
          key: ${{ runner.OS }}-npm-cache-${{ hashFiles('package-lock.json') }}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.OS }}-npm-cache-

      - name: Install dependencies # 4
        run: npm install

      - name: Build # 5 hexo generate 
        run: npm run build #  `npx hexo generate`

      - name: Upload artifact # 6 public 
        uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
        with:
          path: ./public

  deploy: #  deploy 
    needs: build #  build 
    permissions:
      pages: write
      id-token: write
    environment:
      name: github-pages
      url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages #  GitHub Pages
        id: deployment
        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
```

* Hexo *



### 



1. **** Markdown  `source/_posts`

2. **** Git  Github Desktop  GitHub 

   ```
   git add .
   git commit -m ""
   git push origin my-hexo-blog
   ```

3. ****GitHub Actions  "Actions" 

4. ****`https://username.github.io` `hexo g`  `hexo d`

 **Github Actions**  `hexo server` `hexo d`  `git` `hexo d`  `git`

```
  push:
    branches:
      - my-hexo-blog  #  'main' 

jobs:
  build: #  build 
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest #  Ubuntu 
    steps:
      - name: Checkout # 1
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          submodules: recursive  # 

      - name: Setup Node.js # 2 Node.js 
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: "20" #  Node.js 

      - name: Setup npm cache # 3 npm 
        uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: node_modules
          key: ${{ runner.OS }}-npm-cache-${{ hashFiles('package-lock.json') }}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.OS }}-npm-cache-

      - name: Install dependencies # 4
        run: npm install

      - name: Build # 5 hexo generate 
        run: npm run build #  `npx hexo generate`

      - name: Upload artifact # 6 public 
        uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
        with:
          path: ./public

  deploy: #  deploy 
    needs: build #  build 
    permissions:
      pages: write
      id-token: write
    environment:
      name: github-pages
      url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages #  GitHub Pages
        id: deployment
        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
```

* Hexo *



### 



1. **** Markdown  `source/_posts`

2. **** Git  Github Desktop  GitHub 

   ```
   git add .
   git commit -m ""
   git push origin my-hexo-blog
   ```

3. ****GitHub Actions  "Actions" 

4. ****`https://username.github.io` `hexo g`  `hexo d`

 **Github Actions**  `hexo server` `hexo d`  `git` `hexo d`  `git`
